title: Pbe signup isnt working for me
body: When i went on the pbe sign up it keeps saying something when wrong with the sign ups and i can download and create an account but idk if that is right. any help?

replies.body: We noticed earlier today that some players were having a hard time getting that PBE page to work correctly. We're working on getting it smoothed out, but in the meantime let's try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if we can get you signed up!
i tried clearing my browser history but it still says something went wrong. Thank you anyways though :D i hope that the PBE page will be fixed so that the other players and i can sign up
